overview:
Kriti Kapoor: An Entrepreneur, Avid Traveller, Photographer, Marketing Professional, Geek.

Co-founder of Appio Labs, focussed on enterprise mobile apps and Kezaar.com, an online skills sharing marketplace. Recently joined Quality Time Labs as Chief Technology Officer.

Senior marketing professional with 15 years of international experience having worked with leading technology companies (Dell, Compaq and Digital Equipment) across Asia Pacific, EMEA and the United States.

Deep experience in developing creative, strategic, results-driven B2B marketing campaigns for emerging and mature markets covering financial planning, demand generation, media relations, corporate branding, executive thought leadership and industry alliances. Media trained.

Earned an MBA from the London Business School and a B.Sc. in Computer Science and Information Systems from the National University of Singapore. Advisory Board Member of the Chief Marketing Officer (CMO) Council Asia since mid-2011.

Interested to work with companies, social enterprises, NGOs who focus on providing children access to education.

Tweets about: #mobile #marketing #mobilepayments #enterprise #apps #enterprisemobility #education

LinkedIn: http://sg.linkedin.com/in/kritikapoor
